location.title: Location
location.description: Wedding ceremony, party location (both Friday and Saturday) and accomodation for everyone in one place. One minute walking distance between hotel and party location.
location.distanceToCity: Two km to the beautiful old town of Neuburg on the Danube river.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.price: We have reserved a contingent in the hotel right next to the party location for a nightly rate of 144‚Ç¨ for two people in the standard room, including breakfast.
accommodation.cancel: You can cancel your booking for free until 2 weeks before the wedding in case you can't make it.
accommodation.contact: You can also contact the hotel directly via telephone:
accommodation.alternative: You are free to choose an alternative accommodation if you'd like. If you do, please let us know in the RSVP so that we can inform the hotel accordingly.

travelInfo.title: How to Get There
travelInfo.bielefeld: The easiest way to get to the wedding is by car. There is free parking at the hotel premises.
travelInfo.finland: The easiest and fastest way to get to the location is by flying to the Munich International Airport and taking a rental car. There is free parking at the hotel premises. You can also get there by public transport + taxi from the train station.
travelInfo.munich: You can easily get there by train or car. The train ride takes about 1,5h. We can connect you with other guests travelling from Munich if you'd like to share a ride. There is free parking at the hotel premises.

budget.title: Budget
budget.subtitle: Important Considerations
budget.description: We understand that showing up itself represents a significant financial investment for most of you. We wanted to have a full-weekend celebration to make the long travel worth it, and want to be fully transparent about the expected costs for you.
budget.friday: üçª Friday: We will pay the entrance fee and provide Bavarian Brotzeitbrettl for everyone. We'd ask you to pay for any additional food and drinks yourself.
budget.saturday: üçæ Saturday: All food and drinks are on us.
budget.flights: ‚úàÔ∏è Because the wedding takes place during the Oktoberfest, book your flights early to save money!
budget.presents: üéÅ Please don't feel obliged to spend even more money on a present, you coming to celebrate with us is more than we could ask for! ü´∂

rsvp.title: Registration
rsvp.name: Your name
rsvp.diet_placeholder: For example allergies, intolerances, vegan, vegetarian
rsvp.success: Your response has been saved successfully! You can come back here to update it anytime. If you need to cancel your registration, please contact us directly.
rsvp.menu_selection_description: Please select the menu preferences for each participant attending Saturday.

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact us if the problem persists.

login.title: Welcome to the JJ Wedding!
login.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a magic link to sign in
login.not_invited: This email has not been invited. Please check your input or contact us to invite you to the wedding.
login.rate_limit_exceeded: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
login.check_email_message_login: We've sent a magic link to your email address. Click the link to sign in.
login.check_email_message_register: We've sent a link to complete your registration to your email address. Click the link to finish the registration. Once you've completed the registration, you can use your email to login from anywhere without a password.
login.check_email_message_2: The link will expire in 1 hour. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
login.password_info: Your email is not yet registered. Please enter the password we shared with you to register.
login.wrong_password: Wrong password. Please try again or ask us for the password.

register.title: Email verified!
register.subtitle: We have verified your email address. You can now sign in to the wedding website.

questions.question: What is the dress code?
questions.answer: There is no dress code - wear whatever you feel comfortable in! On Friday you could wear something Oktoberfest-themed, if available. On Saturday something semi-formal / festive.

questions.question: Is there time for performances / speeches?
questions.answer: Yes, please contact our best man or maid of honor if you'd like to perform or speak.

questions.question: What kind of gifts do you wish for?
questions.answer: We don't wish any other gift than your presence. If you still want to give us a gift, we would appreciate a contribution to our honeymoon fund.

menu.title: Menu Selection
menu.description: Please let us know how many portions of each dish you would like to order for your group.

hauptspeise.title: Main Course
hauptspeise.braised_beef: Braised ox cheeks with port wine jus, dumpling and field vegetables
hauptspeise.saibling_filet: Trout filet with parmesan crust on white wine foam with pearl barley risotto and field vegetables
hauptspeise.stuffed_schlutzkrapfen: Seasonally stuffed Tyrolean ravioli on sour pumpkin ragout topped with cottage cheese, walnuts and caramel

dessert.title: Dessert Buffet
dessert.kaiserschmarrn: Kaiserschmarrn with plum compote and apple ragout with raisins and almonds

form.success: Your menu selection has been saved successfully!
